attributes.action: adopt  citizens initiated referendums on the lines of the Swiss consitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of voters lack of faith in the parliamentary system, a system based on the swiss constitution could be introduced. There if a group of people feel a constitutional ammendment is required, provided they collect 100,000 valid signatures within 18 months the Government has to have a referendum on the matter, or alternatively come up with a counter proposal ( a compromise)  to create a multiple choice referendum.
